name: ZIDII-MD
description: Javascript WhatsApp bot powered by ZIDII-MD

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Put the owner number for bot.

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Add image URL for menu and mention replies.

PREFIX.description: Paste your bot prefix. Avoid null prefix.

MODE.description: Bot work mode: public / private / inbox / group.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Set true if you want always online mode.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Set true to auto-react to status.

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Set true for automatic replies to status.

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Message to send on status auto-reply.
AUTO_STATUS_MSG.value: *S·¥á·¥á…¥ Y·¥è·¥ú Ä S·¥õ·¥Ä·¥õ·¥ús J·¥ús·¥õ N·¥è·¥° - EDITH-MD ü§ñ*

DELETE_LINK.description: Set true to delete group links automatically.

ANTI_LINK.description: Set true to remove members posting group links.

ANTI_MEDIA.description: Set true to remove members posting medias in group.

MENTION_REPLY.description: Set true for if someOne tag You In group bot will send and audio why the tag you.

ADMIN_EVENTS.description: Set true to notify when admins promote/demote.

WELCOME.description: Set true to enable welcome/goodbye messages.

ANTI_BAD_WORD.description: Set true to auto-delete bad words.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Set true to enable auto-recording presence.

AUTO_TYPING.description: Set true to enable auto-typing presence.

AUTO_REACT.description: Set true to react to every message.

CUSTOM_REACT.description: Set true to enable custom emoji reactions.

CUSTOM_REACT_EMOJIS.description: Custom emojis to use in reactions.

ANTI_DEL_PATH.description: Use 'same' to resend deleted msg in same chat, otherwise 'inbox'.

ANTI_DELETE.description: Set true to show deleted messages.

READ_MESSAGE.description: Set true to mark all messages as read.
